title: How to write a business blog in 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: In 2020, the best piece of advice is to move away from blogging and start making video content. It will help you gain an audience much quicker. YouTube would be a great platform to grow an audience. Once youve built the audience, you can branch off and do other things. Create written content using WordPress. Sell a course. Create an app. All these things need an audience first.
